text: :Do not confuse with mamba, which is a snake Mambo is a word with Afro-Latin connections. Most common meanings are: *Mambo (rhythm): a Cuban or AfroCuban musical rhythm and its associated dance. Invented around 1950 in Havana. *Mambo section: a musical bridge or section in some kinds of Cuban (and Caribbean) music. *Mambo (Voodoo): A Haitian word for a Voodoo priestess. The word also occurs in the title of many pieces of recorded music.
title: Mambo
